description:
To your east is the east entrance to Whitestone Keep, large iron bound
timbers comprise the gate. Polished smooth cobblestone laid wth intricate
detail leads north, west and south. To the west appears to be a large, well
traveled, boulevard leading to the innards of the city. To the north and
south, East Wall Road continues on appearing to be lined with numerous
buildings.
name: Inside the East gate on East Wall Road
